name: Dominion Systems
prompt: corporate logo for Dominion Systems, the weapons conglomerate from Cybermancy. Design a sleek, militaristic emblem combining a stylized shield and geometric weapon motif integrated with digital circuitry. Use metallic dark steel, black, and amber highlights on a light grey background.

name: Neuracore Industries
prompt: corporate logo for Neuracore Industries, the cybernetics and neural interface megacorporation. Design a clean, futuristic emblem combining neural network and human silhouette motifs, symbolizing control and cognition. Use silver, cobalt blue, and white with subtle circuit patterns on a light grey background.

name: Helion Dynamics
prompt: corporate logo for Helion Dynamics, the energy and climate control megacorporation. Create a luminous geometric symbol inspired by a solar flare or energy ring, representing harnessed power and stability. Colors: radiant gold, white, and soft blue with a light grey background.

name: OmniTrine Communications
prompt: corporate logo for OmniTrine Communications, the global data and AI control corporation in Cybermancy. Design a digital trinity emblem combining concentric rings and data nodes, suggesting information flow and connection. Use bright cyan, silver, and black tones on a light grey background.

name: Verdant Biomech
prompt: corporate logo for Verdant Biomech, an agriculture and biosphere engineering megacorp. Create an emblem combining organic leaves and mechanical symmetry, representing synthetic ecology. Use green, gold, and graphite hues with a light grey background.

name: AstraVail Technologies
prompt: corporate logo for AstraVail Technologies, an aerospace and orbital data logistics company in the Cybermancy world. Blend cyberpunk and aerospace motifs: orbital rings, satellites, and digital pathways. Colors: silver, navy, and white with subtle starfield accents on a light grey background.

name: ChimeraGene Solutions
prompt: corporate logo for ChimeraGene Solutions, a biotech and body modification firm in the Cybermancy world. Combine motifs of DNA spirals, molecular structures, and living circuitry. Sleek and futuristic design with hues of bio-luminescent green, violet, and silver on a light grey background.

name: Vesper Syndicate
prompt: corporate logo for Vesper Syndicate, a nightlife and neuro-entertainment corporation from the Cybermancy setting. Design an elegant, neon-infused emblem combining musical waveforms and digital masks. Use glowing magenta, cyan, and black elements on a light grey background.

name: Kirin Logistics
prompt: corporate logo for Kirin Logistics, a global freight and autonomous transport megacorp in the Cybermancy world. Design a stylized red crane motif merged with geometric lines and motion arcs, suggesting speed and precision. Use red, black, and chrome tones on a light grey background.

name: Black Helix Security
prompt: corporate logo for Black Helix Security, a privatized paramilitary enforcement megacorp from Cybermancy. Create a sharp, militaristic emblem featuring a coiled double helix or spiral within a shield. Use matte black, steel grey, and crimson accents on a light grey background.

name: Helios Biotech
prompt: corporate logo for Helios Biotech, the transhuman bioware and genetic ascension megacorp led by Aurelia Vale (Aurum Rex) in the Cybermancy world. Design a sleek, luminous emblem combining a stylized double helix, ascending geometric arcs, and subtle halo or sunburst motifs to suggest transcendence and spiritual biotech. Use clean lines with gold, white, and soft teal accents on a light grey background.
